title: Mini lottery: t213 type 3 ~ 12 card buy a spot
author: trobba

posts.post_title: Mini lottery: t213 type 3 ~ 12 card buy a spot
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

Figured I would try something a little fun to start the new year. In the spirit of buying a spot in a set break, I would like to do a mini 12 card "lottery".

Here are the basics,

12 t213-3 cards (11 commons, 1 HOFer)
Price per slot is $400 (PP f/f or venmo)
Prices range all over the place with these cards so some will see this as a bargain, others not so much.

I think the best way to do a draw would be a zoom call but open to other options, I am not the most tech savvy person around. Also happy to have a second person "in the room" for those who would recommend/require it. 

Please send me an email if you would like to participate, [url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]

If/when I get 12 slots covered I will ask for payment and will arrange a time for the drawing.

Here is a list of the cards (will send pics {4 of them are on another post} to all who subscribe before we start and finalize):

Hoblitzell ~ SGC 20
Mcquillan ~ SGC 40
Mowrey ~ SGC 20
Paskert ~ SGC 40
Quinn ~ SGC 30
Thomas ~ SGC 40
Huggins ~ SGC 40
Davis ~ SGC 10
Donovan ~ SGC 50
Doolan ~ SGC 10
Doolan bat ~ SGC 30
Doyle ~ SGC 50

I will update this post with numbers, so far we have 12 open spots.

Any questions, just ask.

Thanks ~ Rob
